NAME: Colorado
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays state-collected ISP data at broadband serviceable locations that are verified using public speed-test data 2.  Interactive map displays the same information as in Map 1 and also includes broadband funds and broadband service levels.

NAME: Georgia
MapDetails: Interactive map displays unserved locations, and served and unserved areas at the census block level. GA worked with a data company that used parcel data, geocoded addresses, satellite imagery, and broadband deployment data from providers to produce this map.

NAME: Montana
MapDetails: Interactive map displays servicable locations and areas that have received grant funds.

NAME: New Mexico
MapDetails: Interactive map displays broadband broadband serviceable locations based on geocoded enhanced 911 (e911) address data and overlays broadband deployment data from providers

NAME: New York
MapDetails: Interactive map displays broadband serviceable locations based on geocoded e911 address data as well as other private sources and overlays broadband deployment data from providers

NAME: North Carolina
MapDetails: Interactive maps that display broadband serviceable locations,  resident-submitted survey data of Internet access speeds or lack of Internet access (via one of three surveys: General Survey, Farm Survey, and Phone-based Internet Reporting Tool), and areas eligible for state funding.

NAME: Pennsylvania
MapDetails: Interactive map displays broadband serviceable locations, tower locations and fiber presence of fiber, utility poles,  American Community Survey data, and areas that received RDOF funds.

NAME: South Carolina
MapDetails: Interactive map displays broadband serviceable locations and private ISP data.

NAME: Utah
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays broadband availability across the state and includes broadband serviceable locations, FCC 477 data, and private ISP submissions. 2. Interactive map displays areas in the state without Internet access speeds of 25/3 Mbps. and 100/20 Mbpss, and funds that have been awarded.

NAME: Vermont
MapDetails: Interactive map displays broadband serviceable locations based on geocoded e911 address data, cable and fiber routes, and broadband deployment data from providers.

NAME: Virginia
MapDetails: Interactive map displays percentage of broadband serviceable locations served, Form 477 data, towers and poles, and includes a speed test that operates within the map dashboard.

NAME: West Virginia
MapDetails: Multiple interactive maps that include address level detail: broadband investments; provider service areas; demographics; broadband availability; public Wi-Fi; Microsoft data; and the West Virginia Broadband Initiative Plan

NAME: Alabama
MapDetails: Interactive map displays private ISP submissions supplemented by FCC 477 and state speed test results. Map also displays areas that have received or will receive grant funds, and areas where ISPs have submitted a letter of intent.

NAME: Arkansas
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays FCC 477 data & where federal grants were awarded. 2. Map displays results of speed test data by download speed (Mbps) & dashboard summarizes speed test results.

NAME: California
MapDetails: Interactive map displays speed test data, private ISP data, broadband adoption, broadband grants, and political boundaries.

NAME: Delaware
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays resident-submitted locations, ISP service areas, and status of broadband projects (i.e., in-progress or completed). 2. Interactive map displays resident-submitted addresses of only locations without Internet access, and includes link to web-survey to submit an unserved address.

NAME: Florida
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays where grant funds were awarded, broadband speed test results, community anchor institutions, environmentally sensitive lands, maximum download speeds, fiber-served areas, and areas with no available fixed Internet service. 2. Interactive map displays crowd-sourced speed test data.

NAME: Hawaii
MapDetails: Interactive map displays wired, Wi-Fi, and Ookla speed test results from residents.

NAME: Louisiana
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays % of parish residents unserved, areas that may receive RDOF funds, median household income, poverty rate, and estimates of digital illiteracy  - data from FCC & U.S. Dept of Education. 2.  Interactive map displays Delta Regional Authority speed test results

NAME: Maine
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays results from state-wide speed test submissions. 2. Interactive map displays data reported by providers to the ConnectME Authority and/or the FCC, from June of 2019 with some direct reporting as recently as Sept 2021.

NAME: Maryland
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data and speed test results.

NAME: Missouri
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays FCC 477 data and areas that have received grants. 2. Gallery of interactive maps that display broadband funding, planning, availability, and more.

NAME: Nebraska
MapDetails: 1. Interactive map displays results of household speed tests.  2. Interactive map displays FCC 477 data and where recent funds were/will be dispersed.

NAME: Ohio
MapDetails: Gallery of static and interactive broadband maps. Static maps display availability gaps indicated using FCC 477 data and Ookla speed test data, and current broadband projects. Interactive map  displays FCC 477 data along with detailed service area data provided by ISPs.

NAME: Oklahoma
MapDetails: Interactive map displays speed test data from Ookla, FCC 477 data, private ISP data, and areas that received CAF/CAF II funds.

NAME: Washington
MapDetails: Interactive map displays crowd-sourced speed test data with geocoded coordinates imbedded in the speed test survey to show broadband availability and performance, or the lack of broadband availability

NAME: Wyoming
MapDetails: Interactive map displays speed test data and dashboard displays summary statistics about broadband availability and adoption across the state.

NAME: Illinois
MapDetails: Internactive map displays data derived from a combination of direct provider outreach and data collection, FCC Form 477 data, verified consumer broadband feedback, and independent research conducted by Connected Nation. The map also displays where broadband grants have been distributed.

NAME: Michigan
MapDetails: Interactive and static maps display detailed service area information provided by ISPs, FCC-477 data, areas to receive funding, indication of providers offering ACP, and unserved areas.

NAME: Minnesota
MapDetails: Interactive and fixed maps display provider-submitted service areas, FCC-477 data, and areas to receive/have received funding.

NAME: Tennessee
MapDetails: Interactive map is undergoing revisions  following a public comment period and is anticipated to be re-released in Fall 2022.

NAME: Texas
MapDetails: Interactive map displays detailed service areas provided by ISPs, FCC 477 data, and Internet subscription data from ACS. Texas Broadband Development Office is preparing a broadband availability map indicating eligible vs. ineligible areas for financial assistance that will include a challenge process to dispute inaccuracies (expected: Jan 2023).

NAME: Wisconsin
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data, private ISP submissions, and where funds were/will be dispersed.

NAME: Alaska
MapDetails: 1. Story map (combination of text, interactive maps, and static maps) that includes: map of current and funded fiber/microwave/satellite infrastructure, map of served and unserved areas by population density, and map of schools and libraries relative to current broadband footprints and more 2. Static maps display the technology type used to provide Internet access coverage at the census block level, including: DSL, Fiber, and Cable.

NAME: Indiana
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data and locations to receive funding.

NAME: Iowa
MapDetails: Interactive map displays locations likely eligible or likely ineligible for broadband service, funding that has been awarded at that location, and the maximum Internet access speed available at that location.

NAME: Oregon
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data along with ACS data (2020)

NAME: South Dakota
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data and where funds have been awarded.

NAME: Arizona
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Connecticut
MapDetails: Interactive map displays FCC 477 data summarized into categories of served (> 100/20 Mbps), underserved (< 100/20 Mbps and > 25/3 Mbps), and unserved (25/3 Mbps or less)); network type (e.g., fiber, cable, dsl, etc…); and demographic information from the American Community Survey (2020).

NAME: District of Columbia
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Idaho
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Kansas
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Kentucky
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available. Static maps of KentuckyWired network - a "middle mile" project to provide fiber connections to every county in the state.

NAME: Massachusetts
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available. Static maps displaying current status of "last mile" projects in western and central towns in the state & interactive map that contain broadband broadband serviceable locations (interactive map not up-to-date)

NAME: Mississippi
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Nevada
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: New Hampshire
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: New Jersey
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: North Dakota
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available

NAME: Rhode Island
MapDetails: No up-to-date map available
